reuters.title: MIDDLE SOUTH <MSU> UNIT PLANS TO RETIRE DEBT
reuters.body: System Energy Resources Inc, a unit of Middle South Utilities Inc, said it plans to file with the Securities and Exchange Commission a request for authorization to retire a number of outstanding first mortgage bonds. It plans to buy back up to 300 mln dlrs of 16 pct first mortgage bonds due 2000 and up to 100 mln dlrs of 15-3/8 pct mortgage bonds of 2000. To refinance the redemptions, System Energy said it would ask the SEC for approval to issue up to 300 mln dlrs of new first mortgage bonds. Reuter 
